metadata.title: CVE-2016-10040 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in QXmlSimpleReader in Qt 4.8.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a xml file with multiple nested open tags.

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.11.3+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
